//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Qutrubi is an application for arabic verbs conjugation in easy way, it enables users to learn conjugation. Qutrubi program is free software and open source,it is built on Qutrub. The program can be used to conjugate verbs in tenses and pronouns The application conjugate verbs offline, and can allow you to connect to the Qutrub web online
The program can be customized, and allow to choice conjugation mode for triliteral verbs.The program displays the verb properties. Qutrubi conjugate most used verbs offline based on a database which is generated from Qutrub conjugator, and allow to connect to Qutrub web Site to conjugate other verbs. The application contains games to learn users to conjugate verbs and verbs properties. You can contact us for your comments and suggestion via e-mailي
To download:
Developers: BENZITOUNE Ahmed and KIHAL Redouane, Supervized by Taha Zerrouki.
